name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Golang Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications, specializing in **Golang**, **Kubernetes**, and **Microservices**. Proven expertise in building **API** integrations and designing **Distributed Systems** that enhance operational efficiency. Proficient in implementing **Event-Driven Architecture** and ensuring high code quality through rigorous **Testing**, **Code Review**, and **Version Control** practices. Adept at fostering a collaborative environment with a **Startup Mindset**, driving innovation and agile methodologies.

Additionally skilled in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with hands-on experience in both frontend and backend development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in delivering AI/ML-powered platforms that support predictive analytics and automation. Strong background in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, and adept at implementing **Continuous Integration** and **Open Source** solutions. Well-versed in compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed and maintained microservices architecture leveraging **Golang** to enhance system performance and scalability in healthcare and fintech applications.
Implemented and optimized **API** services for distributed systems, ensuring efficient communication between microservices and external integrations in compliance with industry standards.
Led the migration of legacy systems to **Kubernetes**, ensuring seamless deployment and management of containerized applications, improving system reliability and fault tolerance.
Conducted thorough **code reviews** and enforced robust testing strategies across the technology stack, utilizing tools such as Jest and PyTest to maintain high-quality code and coverage of at least **90%**.
Established and managed **Continuous Integration** pipelines, integrating tools like GitHub Actions and CircleCI to streamline development processes and enhance collaboration within the team.
Pioneered the adoption of **Event-Driven Architecture**, enhancing responsiveness and scalability of applications to handle increasing client demands effectively.
Fostered a **startup mindset** within the team, encouraging innovative approaches to problem-solving and the integration of open-source solutions for rapid development.
Emphasized collaboration across cross-functional teams to drive successful project outcomes, enhancing communication and project visibility.
Explored and integrated modern frameworks and technologies to revolutionize legacy applications, focusing on performance improvements and advanced feature implementations.
Utilized **Version Control** systems to manage and track changes across projects, ensuring a seamless workflow and code integrity within the team.

Designed and implemented **microservices** architecture utilizing **Golang** to enhance the scalability and performance of financial platforms for high-volume transactional systems.
Developed and maintained RESTful **APIs** for core functionalities, ensuring seamless integration with front-end applications and third-party services.
Collaborated within cross-functional teams, fostering a **startup mindset**, to drive projects from inception to delivery while maintaining high standards in **code review** and **testing** processes.
Led the deployment of **Kubernetes** for container orchestration, improving deployment frequency by **30%**, thus enhancing system reliability and scalability.
Engineered a powerful **event-driven architecture** utilizing Kafka and RabbitMQ, ensuring efficient asynchronous communication to support critical workflows in payment processes and compliance.
Employed **Continuous Integration** practices and tools to automate build and deployment pipelines, reducing the release time by **25%**.
Actively contributed to **open source** projects, demonstrating a commitment to community collaboration and knowledge sharing.
Implemented best practices for **version control** and documentation, ensuring smooth onboarding for new team members and enhanced project maintainability.

Designed and optimized microservices architecture using **Golang** for a global e-commerce platform, ensuring high availability and scalability with **Kubernetes** orchestration.
Developed and integrated APIs to facilitate communication between distributed systems, enhancing system interactions and data handling across various modules.
Engineered event-driven architecture powered by Kafka and RabbitMQ, enabling responsive order updates and real-time event broadcasting.
Implemented rigorous testing practices and participated in code reviews to maintain high code quality and reliability across **Golang** applications.
Leveraged version control tools for continuous integration and deployment processes, facilitating seamless updates and collaboration within the development team.
Employed **Open Source** technologies for enhancing productivity, while applying a startup mindset to innovate and improve existing systems rapidly.
Collaborated cross-functionally with product and design teams to ensure alignment on project goals and deliverables, improving the overall team performance and project outcomes.
